entry.title: DFDL WG - document #313: Clarify empty string behaviour for text number properties that do not specify it
entry.content:
• Status changed from submitted to accepted

Properties dfdl:textStandardNaNRep and dfdl:textStandardInfinityRep will state empty string not allowed. Schema definition error if empty string found as the property value.

entry.content:

  • % Done changed from 0 to 100

Erratum 5.28 of Experience Doc 4.
